step.datasource: SELECT SI.Itemcode, SI.SalesPackagePrice AS Synergy_Price, ROUND(NI.SalesPackagePrice,3) AS SalesPackagePrice, ROUND(NI.SalesPackagePrice,3) AS SalesPrice FROM [%abeitargetdb%]..items AS SI INNER join [%abeisourcedb%]..items AS NI ON SI.ItemCode = NI.itemcode WHERE SI.SalesPackagePrice <> ROUND(NI.SalesPackagePrice,3) AND NI.SalesPackagePrice > 0

select SI.Itemcode, SI.SalesPackagePrice AS Synergy_Price, UI.SalesPackagePrice AS USA_Price
, ROUND( CASE WHEN SI.SalesPackagePrice = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN apr.rate is null THEN (SELECT (SI.SalesPackagePrice + apr2.additionalcosts) * apr2.rate FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_ArticlePriceRates apr2 with (nolock) where apr2.code = '00') ELSE (SI.salespackageprice + apr.additionalcosts) * apr.rate end END,3 ) as SalesPrice
, ROUND( CASE WHEN SI.SalesPackagePrice = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN apr.rate is null THEN (SELECT (SI.SalesPackagePrice + apr2.additionalcosts) * apr2.rate FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_ArticlePriceRates apr2 with (nolock) where apr2.code = '00') ELSE (SI.salespackageprice + apr.additionalcosts) * apr.rate end END,3 ) as SalesPackagePrice
FROM [%abeisourcedb%]..items as SI INNER join [%abeitargetdb%]..items as UI ON SI.ItemCode = UI.itemcode LEFT OUTER JOIN [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_ArticlePriceRates apr WITH (NOLOCK) ON SI.ItemCode like apr.Code + '%' WHERE ABS(UI.SalesPackagePrice - ROUND( CASE WHEN SI.SalesPackagePrice = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CASE WHEN apr.rate is null THEN (SELECT (SI.SalesPackagePrice + apr2.additionalcosts) * apr2.rate FROM [%abeitargetdb%].dbo._AB_ArticlePriceRates apr2 with (nolock) where apr2.code = '00') ELSE (SI.salespackageprice + apr.additionalcosts) * apr.rate end END,3 ) ) > 0,001

SELECT top 100 percent c.cmp_code, c.cmp_wwn, c.id, 'B' AS cmp_status from cicmpy c WHERE c.cmp_status = 'A' and cmp_type = 'C' AND NOT c.cmp_code in ( Select cmp_code from cicmpy left join [orlaco]..DivisionDebtors d on d.division = 484 and c.debnr = d.debtor where NOT d.debtor IS NULL OR ( c.cmp_fctry IN ('US', 'CA') OR c.debnr in ( select distinct verzdebnr from orkrg) OR c.debnr in ( select distinct debnr from orkrg) OR c.debnr in ( select distinct einddebnr from orkrg) OR c.debnr in ( select distinct fakdebnr from orkrg) ))

select cmp_wwn, CASE Currency WHEN 'EUR' THEN 'SALESPRICE_EURO' ELSE 'SALESPRICE' END AS PriceList from [484]..cicmpy where ( Pricelist is null and cmp_status = 'A' and cmp_type = 'C' )OR (pricelist in ( 'NA US 2018', 'NA_EUR', 'NA_USD', 'NA-USD DDP', 'SALESPRICE') AND pricelist != CASE Currency WHEN 'EUR' THEN 'SALESPRICE_EURO' ELSE 'SALESPRICE' END )
